name: Pumpkin Spice Loaf & Muffins
description: It’s pumpkin spice season again! This is the easiest & tastiest gluten-free pumpkin spiced baked good you will ever make. One package of the mix can make one loaf or 12 muffins.
preparation: Generously oil Rectangular Steamer using basting brush.
In large bowl, whisk eggs. Whisk in pumpkin purée and oil. Whisk in mix.

Scrape batter into steamer; smooth top. Microwave* for 8 min on high, uncovered. Rest in steamer for 6 min; invert onto wire rack to cool. Or bake in preheated 350° F oven, 50–55 min. Cool in steamer 15 min; unmold.
When completely cool, spread on icing, if desired. Slice and serve.
tips: Divide and spoon batter into oiled Muffin Maker. Bake in preheated 375° F oven for 15–18 min. Cool in pan 10 min; unmold. Makes 12 muffins.
*Cooking time may vary based on microwave wattage. Tastes best when eaten the same day.
